org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.ieee1609dot2.validator

Class CountryOnlyRegionValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.ieee1609dot2.validator.BaseRegionValidator
      • org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.ieee1609dot2.validator.CountryOnlyRegionValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RegionValidator

    public class CountryOnlyRegionValidator
extends BaseRegionValidator
    Implementation of a RegionValidatior that only supports identified region containing country only as type. All other are disregarded with an InvalidCertificateException.

    • Method Detail

      • validateRegion

        public void validateRegion(GeographicRegion checkRegion,
                           Certificate[] certificateChain)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                           InvalidCertificateException
        Method to verify that the region in certificate matches the requirement in the issuer certificate. If certificate is self-signed it ignore the certificate.
        Parameters:
        checkRegion - the expected region to validate the certificate for.
        certificateChain - the certificate to verify region in, end entity certificate first and root cert last.
        Throws:
        InvalidCertificateException - if region in given certificate was invalid.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if other argument was invalid not related to the region in the certificate.
